# Challenge: Understanding Ralph Loop

Learn about Ralph Loop and when to use it.

## What is Ralph Loop?
Ralph Loop is an agentic loop feature that allows Claude Code to work autonomously on iterative tasks, continuously working until the task is complete or you stop it.

## Objectives
1. Learn what Ralph Loop is and when to use it
2. Understand the difference between regular prompts and agentic loops
3. Create documentation explaining Ralph Loop
